oracle text:
2/2

Whenever Banana Wizard enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (A food token is an artifact with "2, T, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
You may tap three untapped Food tokens you control and pay 2 mana to cast Banana Spell. (Banana Spell is an instant that creates two 1/1 Banana creature tokens with reach.) 

Flavor Text:
"I love bananas! Bananas, bananas, bananas! I also like to turn them into magic spells."
